title: Client is laggy af, and first game of my PC being on doesn't let me load in? (6.14)
body:
Hi all, wondering if anyone else has had any client problems with 6.14? Every single time I hit the loading screen after champ select the borders won't load, I'll just a black screen and i get a popup message saying 'You have disconnected from the internet, please reconnect and try again.' It's getting super annoying, and since 6.14, my client has been lagging out, which it never did before! :(

I defragged my hardrive AND reinstalled league and still the issue persists, simply closing and re-opening my client doesn't help, but i have to restart my pc, then it works which makes 0 sense. This lag doesn't happen on any other games either, only league T-T

I'm currently running Windows 7 with the following specs:
Intel Core i7 4790 @ 3.60GHz
16.0GB Ram
2047MB NVIDIA GeForce GTX 770

I have 170GB free on my 500GB hardrive, and a 550 Watt cooling system..

Send help T-T

replies.body: Your issue may be caused by a connection issue reaching our servers and resulting in a black screen.  As Rineyy suggested, please go over our [Connection Issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help fix this up.  Please let me know if you have any questions.

Crashes during the Loading Screen usually stems from connection issues. [Troubleshoot them.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)
